Description:
You find a group of finely carved totems representing what looks like some important undersea Loas. 

Most of the totems are in good condition, and you can recognize their shape, but three of them are far more deteriorated. 

Near the base of the totems, there are some tools and materials, but they are in such bad condition that you are sure they won’t last more than one use.
DescriptionAction: Would you like to repair one of the totems?

    "SSRewardText": "After you finish repairing the totem, a valiant voice speaks from it and tells you that the crab is a devoted protector of the sea bottom. \r\n\nHe is the tireless cleaner of the sea who doesn’t hesitate to get his claws dirty if it means a better future for the inhabitants of the sea. In stepping forward and getting your hands dirty rebuilding this totem, you have proven yourselves to be in tune with the crab's teachings! \r\n\nYou feel infused with the spirit of the crab.",

    "SSCRewardText": "After you finish repairing the crab totem, a valiant voice speaks from it and tells you the story of the crab. \r\n\nThe crab is the protector of the sea bottom and his task is to keep it clean, not only physically but spiritually too. A mere cleaner as he may be, over time, he has learned that sometimes you can repurpose what you are supposed to destroy to your advantage, in order to build a brighter future, for, in the end, that is all that matters. \r\n\nYou feel infused with the spirit of the crab.",

    "SSCRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSCRewardText": "After you finish repairing the octopus totem, a guttural voice speaks from it and tells you the story of the octopus. \r\n\nHe doesn’t have the sharpest teeth or is the fastest swimmer, but he has the biggest brain and knows how to use it. \r\n\nHide, be patient, and wait until your enemies make a mistake. Then, strike from where they least expect it and finish them with a tight grab. Give them time to realize the fatal mistake they made in underestimating you. In the end, they will learn that you were always in control, and that is all that matters. \r\n\nYou feel infused with the spirit of the octopus.",

    "SSCRewardText": "After you finish repairing the dolphin totem, a gentle voice speaks from it and tells you the story of the dolphin. \r\n\nHe explains that when he realized how the Loa’s mischievousness could harm the good people of the archipelago, he made it his mission to help those affected. \r\n\nOver time, he learned that helping others is the perfect way to spread kindness, and in the end, that is all that matters. \r\n\nYou feel infused with the spirit of the dolphin.",
